short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts Active/Scheduled course coupon data from course creator's Promotions page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our Chrome extension provides a simple solution for extracting, formatting, and copying coupon data from the Udemy courses "Promotions" tab; this allows Udemy course instructors to easily market their coupons via email and other avenues.
